product_name: Komperdell Carbon Approach Vario 4 Trekking Poles - Pair - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Komperdell Carbon Approach Vario 4 Trekking Poles shave weight and save space with a innovative 4-section folding design, making them easy to take along on all your hikes and backpacking trips. Ultralight carbon shafts damp vibration and retain strength over a wide temperature range. Power Lock external locking mechanisms are easy to use, even at low temperatures and while wearing gloves. Foam grips are contoured to fit comfortably in your hands; adjustable, padded wrist straps add support. Komperdell Carbon Approach Vario 4 Trekking Poles feature low-profile trekking baskets and durable tungsten carbide tips.
short_description: The Komperdell Carbon Approach Vario 4 Trekking Poles shave weight and save space with a innovative 4-section folding design, making them easy to take along on all your hikes and backpacking trips.
